lines.text: [Dee Dee walk in on Julie making out with Frankie]
Dee Dee, hi. Um... you remember her? Her name's Julie.
Oh, I remember her. The bride of Godzilla!
I have just one question. Did you kiss him because he's lovable, or because he's the only man on the beach?
Because he looked hungry. His last meal obviously didn't satisfy him.
Oh, it's a good thing you happended along. I'm sure you could cater supper to an entire army.
Now that's in bad taste.
Oh, no. One man at a time. I like to be a devoted chef.
But right now you're serving a lot of free meals. Sort of a one-woman bread line.
Ooo, that's smart!

[getting angry]
I can afford it!
Then he must be of your charity cases!
Hold on, the football here would like to say something.
Well, I'm not through!
Figures!

[to Julie]
As the man said, this is a public beach and we're supposed to keep it clean.
Now that's really in bad taste!

[to Dee Dee]
Then perhaps, you better leave.
Very good!

[to Julie]
I plan to!
No, wait. Don't quit now, Dee Dee. I think your ahead.
Okay, how's this for a closer?
[slaps him]
How come you're in that cage protected, and I'm out here getting bumbed off?
Sanctuary.
Sanctuary?

Yeah, sanctuary from them. These beach kids. I had to build this thing to protect myself. I used to have a beautiful Cappy's place even more beautiful than this. And just last year, these beach kids completely demolished it and pretty near demolished me with it during a rumble all because of a stranger like you. Hey, you're not another one of those anthropologist explorers or something? A sex maniac maybe?
I don't have any hobbies.
[watches the climatic rumble betweent the beach bums and muscle maniacs]
Oh no! They're not gonna wreck my place again?
[a beach bum is flung over a table, breaking it]

[depressed tone]
Oh, yes they are.

[Seeing kids dancing]
You know if there was no music here this place would be raided.

[Seeing kids dancing and partying]
Good heavens, where are the mothers of America?

[after being introduced to Flex Martian]
You are so strong!
I'm the strongest!
And so handsome!
I'm the handsomest!

[admiring his big muscles]
And so big!

[smiles]
Yes, ma'am!

[signalling to the chopper pilot to land on the beach]
Lower! Go lower!
If we go any lower, we'll cut off their heads!
I'm not interested in their heads!
